Translations.Text: An la shi tiandi de guangming. Ta de guangming haobi bi ge zhong de yi zhan mingdeng. Na zhan mingdeng zai yige boli zhao nei, nage boli zhao youru yi ke canlan de mingxing. Na zhan mingdeng shi yong yi ke jixiang de ganlan shu you ranzhe de, ta ji bushi dongfang de [ru zaochen de riguang], ye bushi xifang de [ru xiawu de riguang]. Ta de you jishi bu yu huo jiechu, yeshi faguang de, guang shang tian guang. An la yindao tasuo yiyu zhe zouxiang guangming. An la wei renlei shele xuduo biyu, an la shi quanzhi wanshi wanwu de.
[Ci guang] zai an la zhunxu jianzao de yixie fangwu [zhu 1][qingzhensi] zhong, bing zhunxu zai qizhong zan nian ta de zun ming. Zhaoxi dou zai qizhong zansong ta [zhu 2][an la] de,
shi yixie nanren. Maoyi he maimai meiyou shi tamen shuhu zan nian an la [zhu], jin shou bai gong he wan na tian ke. Tamen weiju na xinjingdanzhan de rizi [fuhuo ri].
Yibian an la yi tamen de zui hao shangong baochou tamen, bing ci gei tamen geng duo de enhui. An la wuxian liang ci gei tasuo yiyu zhe [zhu].

Zhiyu bu xinyang zhe, tamen de shangong youru shamo zhong de shen jing, kou ke zhe yiwei na shi shui, deng ta daoda nali shi, ta shenme ye meiyou zhaodao, zhi faxian an la zai nali. An la ba ta ying shou de [huoxing] gei ta. An la shi qingsuan shensu de.

Huozhe [bu xinyang zhe de qingkuang] youru yige ren zai wangyang dahai de chongchong hei'an zhong zhengzha er bei botao yanmo, zai ta shangmian ji you botao, yeyou wuyun, hei'an chongchong, jihu shenshou bujian wuzhi. An la wei ci gei shei guangming, shei jiu meiyou guangming.

Nandao ni bu zhidao ma? Tiandi jian de yiqie ji zhanchi [feixiang] de niao dou zansong an la [zhu]. Ta [an la] dique zhidao wanwu [dui ta] de qidao he zansong. Fanshi tamen suo zuo de, an la shi quanzhi de.
Tiandi de zhuquan shi an la de, wei an la shi zuihou de guisu.

Nandao ni meiyou kanjian ma? An la shi yun man man yidong, ranhou shi qi jiehe, ranhou shi qi jiju, ranhou, ni jiu kanjian yu cong yun zhong jiangxia. Ta cong tiankong, cong rushan de yunceng nei jiangxia bingbao, jie ci chengfa tasuo yiyu zhe, bi kai tasuo yiyu zhe. Shandian jihu duo zoule shijue.
An la shi zhouye lunliu [zhu], dui yanguang minrui de renmen, ci zhong que youyi zhong jianjie.

An la cong shuizhong chuangzao yiqie dongwu, qizhong youyong fubu paxing de, youyong liang zu xingzou de, yeyou yong si zu xingzou de. An la chuangzao tasuo yiyu de. An la dui wanshi que shi wanneng de.
Wo que yi [zai zhe bu “gulanjing” zhong] jiang shi xuduo mingbai de jixiang. An la yindao tasuo yiyu zhe zunxing zhengdao [yisilan jiao].
Tamen [wei xinzhe] shuo:“Women xinyang an la he shizhe [mu sheng]le, women fucongle.” Ran'er, cihou tamen zhong youxie ren you beilile, zhexie ren bushi xinshi.
Dang tamen bei zhaohuan qu xinyang an la [de “gulanjing”] ji qi shizhe [mu sheng], yibian ta [mu sheng] wei tamen panjue shi, tamen zhong youxie ren mashang jiu [jujue bing] bi kaile.
Jiaru tamen youli, tamen jiu qiangong de lai jian ta [mu sheng].
Zhe shi tamen de xinzhong you bing ne? Haishi tamen zai huaiyi? Huo shi tamen haipa an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng] hui dui tamen [panjue] bugong? Bu, zhexie ren que shi bu yi zhe [zhu].

Dang xinshimen bei zhaohuan qu xinyang an la [de “gulanjing”] ji qi shizhe [mu sheng], yibian ta [mu sheng] wei tamen panjue shi, tamen chang shuo:“Women tingjianle, women fucongle.” Zhexie ren que shi chenggong zhe [houshi yong ju leyuan].
Shei fucong an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng], jingwei an la, jinzhi jinze, name, zhexie ren que shi chenggong zhe.
